results.content: I am finding this course to be very helpful for the reason I purchased it for. I would like to know the instructor's take on the new Elementor page builder plugin. More curiosity than anything, because I bought the page builder a couple months ago. Overall, I am very satisfied. There have been a few plugins I have been curious about, and before purchasing any premium versions, I was given the opportunity to see it in action and get some of my questions answered. This is a great course for anyone new to setting up a WP site or curious which plugins experts might have in their treasure chest.

results.content:
Wow this is helpfull - there are so many plugins and functions in wp. It really helps a lot to have a guide like this.

Aside from the exsisting contend Rob is also very responsive and willing to help. 

As extra bonus he will add more lectures once he can detect that a function is needed by several participants.
